header.title: Introduction

section.title: Purpose
section.p: This application provides an API to public key infrastructure from RFC 3280 (X.509 certificates) and public key formats defined by the PKCS-standard.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: It is assumed that the reader is familiar with the Erlang programming language, concepts of OTP and has a basic understanding of the concepts of using public keys.

section.title: Performance tips
section.p: The public_key decode and encode functions will try to use the nifs which are in the asn1 compilers runtime modules if they can be found. So for the best performance you want to have the asn1 application in the path of your system.
